text: ād (namæti janatāva nam) bhūmiyehi asādhāraṇayē ahaṁkāra vī “apaṭa vaḍā śaktivantayin kavurunda?”yi pævasūha. ovunva utpādanaya kaḷa allāh niyata vaśayenma ovunṭa vaḍā balasampannayeki yanna ovun avadhānaya kara bælūvē nædda? (ehet) ovun apagē (mevæni) sādhakayanda, (tarka kara) pratikṣēpa karaminma siṭiyaha
